alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Calhoun; Lexington; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 8:58AM EDT until March 26 at 9:30AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Southern Lexington County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Aiken County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 930 AM EDT. * At 858 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northeast of Aiken State Park, or 16 miles southeast of Batesburg-Leesville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Cayce, Red Bank, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Aiken State Park, Swansea, Wagener, Pelion, Perry, Woodford, Perry Airport, Lexington County Airport At Pelion, Lexington Acres Pond, Peachtree Rock, Edmund, Thor, Steedman, New Holland and Samaria Fire Station. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 27 and 43. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
